Title: Wanted: Disoriented Wishtail
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the legendary Wishtail for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Expedition members have reported seeing a colorful fish matching its purported appearance inside a massive water elemental in Azure Span.
PortraitGiverText: A powerful water elemental is stirring up trouble, and fish, in one of the Azure Span's ponds.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
